articles.title: Angels Minor Leaguer Rio Foster in critical condition after car accident - MLB.com
articles.description:
ANAHEIM -- Angels Minor League outfielder Rio Foster was a passenger in a serious car crash early Friday and is in critical condition, the club announced on Friday.
The Angels released a statement about Foster, who was just named the Northwest League Player o…
